TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataPointCollection extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartElementCollection`1<class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.DataPoint>
Public Class DataPointCollection Inherits ChartElementCollection(Of DataPoint)

summary.span: 表示 对象集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示的集合对象，它们反过来表示数据点属于对象。The class represents a collection of objects, which in turn represent the data points that are part of a object. 此集合类实现为属性对象。This collection class is implemented as the property of a object. 可以追加对象，或将其插入到具有其 X 值和 Y 的集合的已指定为参数的值。 objects can be appended or inserted into the collection with their X-value and Y-value(s) already specified as parameters. 请注意，它们都会还时自动添加一系列绑定到数据源使用或方法。Note that they are also added automatically when a series is bound to a data source using either the or method. 按它们发生在此集合中的，仅当该集合所属的序列的顺序绘制数据点其属性设置为`true`(默认值是`false`)，或如果的所有数据点的所有 X 值都都为零。Data points are plotted in the order that they occur in this collection only if the series that the collection belongs to has its property set to `true` (the default value is `false`), or if all X-values for all data points are zero. 否则会绘制数据点使用其 X 值。Otherwise data points are plotted using their X-values. 数据点可以位于，和操作，基于最大、 最小值或指定的 X 或 Y 值使用重载`FindMaxValue`，`FindMinValue`或`FindValue`方法，分别。Data points can be located, and manipulated, based on maximum, minimum or specified X or Y-values using the overloaded `FindMaxValue`, `FindMinValue` or `FindValue` methods, respectively. [DataPointCollection.Count]()属性指示集合中项的总数和通常用于查找集合中的上限。The [DataPointCollection.Count]() property indicates the total number of items in the collection and is commonly used to find the upper bound of the collection.

param.span: Y 值。

span.span: The Y-value.

summary.span: 向集合中添加一个新的 对象并设置其 Y 值。

span.span: Adds a new object to the collection and sets its Y value.
The new object.

summary.span: 向集合的末尾添加一个具有指定的 X 值和 Y 值的 对象。

span.span: Adds a object to the end of the collection, with the specified X-value and Y-value(s).

param.span: 数据点的 X 值。

span.span: X-value of the data point.

param.name: yValue
param.span: 数据点的 Y 值。

span.span: Y-value of the data point.

summary.span: 向集合的末尾添加一个具有指定的 X 值和 Y 值的 对象。

span.span: Adds a object to the end of the collection, with the specified X-value and Y-value.

returns.span: 一个 ，表示数据点集合中项插入处的零始索引。

span.span: An that represents the zero-based index where the item was inserted into the data point collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将添加对象传递给; 对象始终添加到集合的末尾。This method adds object to the ; the object is always added to the end of the collection. 使用方法重载，如果你的数据点需要多个 Y 值。Use the method overload if your data points require more than one Y-value. 如果你的数据点不需要 X 值-即，如果要创建非散点图 — 使用方法相反。If your data points do not need an X-value—that is, if you are creating non-scatter plots—use the method instead.

span.span: The X value of the data point.

param.name: yValue
param.span: 一个或多个逗号分隔值，表示数据点的 Y 值。

span.span: One or more comma-separated values that represent the Y-value(s) of the data point.

summary.span: 向集合的末尾添加一个具有指定的 X 值和 Y 值的 对象。

span.span: Adds a object to the end of the collection, with the specified X-value and Y-value(s).

returns.span: 一个 值，该值表示集合中项插入处的零始索引。

span.span: An value that represents the zero-based index where the item was inserted into the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将添加一个对象传递给; 数据点总是添加到集合的末尾。This method adds one object to the ; the data point is always added to the end of the collection. 必须提供至少一 （1） Y 值，否则将引发异常。You must provide at least one (1) Y-value, otherwise an exception will be thrown. 此方法还检查属性对象，此数据属于; 如果指定太多的 Y 值，将引发异常。This method also checks the property of the object that this data belongs to; if too many Y-values are specified, an exception will be thrown. 为了使格式设置产生任何影响，则值必须为对象。In order for formatting to have an effect, a value must be a object. 如果你的数据点不需要 X 值-即，如果要创建非散点图 — 使用方法改为If your data points do not need an X-value—that is, if you are creating non-scatter plots—use the method instead

summary.span: 向集合的末尾添加一个具有指定 Y 值的 对象。

span.span: Adds a object to the end of the collection, with the specified Y-value(s).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将添加一个对象传递给; 数据点总是添加到集合的末尾。This method adds one object to the ; the data point is always added to the end of the collection. 使用允许的 Y 值的数组，如果你的数据点需要多个 Y 值的方法定义。Use the method definition that allows for an array of Y-values if your data points require more than one Y-value. 如果你的数据点需要 X 值-即，如果要创建散点图 — 使用之一`AddXY`方法相反。If your data points need an X-value—that is, if you are creating scatter plots—use one of the `AddXY` methods instead.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将添加一个对象传递给; 数据点总是添加到集合的末尾。This method adds one object to the ; the data point is always added to the end of the collection. 必须提供至少一 （1） Y 值，否则将引发异常。You must provide at least one (1) Y-value, otherwise an exception will be thrown. 此方法还检查属性此数据所属的对象; 如果指定太多的 Y 值，将引发异常。This method also checks the property of the object this data belongs to; if too many Y-values are specified, an exception will be thrown. X 值将始终设置为零 (0)，从而导致非散点图。The X-value will always be set to zero (0), resulting in non-scatter plots. 如果你想要使用 X 值的数据点，则调用之一`AddXY`方法相反。If you want the data points to use an X-value, call one of the `AddXY` methods instead. 为了使格式设置产生任何影响，则值必须为对象。In order for formatting to have an effect, a value must be a object. 下列部分获取有效的.NET Framework 类型可以用于的对象类型参数的完整列表，请参阅：Refer to the following for a complete listing of valid .NET Framework types that can be used for the object type parameters: |||| |-|-|-| |StringString|DateTimeDateTime|DoubleDouble| |DecimalDecimal|SingleSingle|Int32Int32| |UInt32UInt32|Int64Int64|UInt64UInt64|

MemberSignature.Value: public void DataBind (System.Collections.IEnumerable dataSource, string xField, string yFields, string otherFields);

Public Sub DataBind (dataSource As IEnumerable, xField As String, yFields As String, otherFields As String)
public: void DataBind(System::Collections::IEnumerable ^ dataSource, System::String ^ xField, System::String ^ yFields, System::String ^ otherFields);

param.name: dataSource
param.span: 数据源。

span.span: The data source.

param.name: xField
param.span: 用于 X 值的字段的名称。

span.span: The name of the field for X-values.

param.name: yFields
param.span: 一个逗号分隔的列表，其中列出了用于 Y 值的字段的名称。

span.span: A comma separated names of the fields for Y-values.

param.name: otherFields
param.span: 带有绑定规则的其他数据点属性，格式为：PointProperty=Field[{Format}] [,PointProperty=Field[{Format}]]。

span.span: Other data point properties with binding rules, in the format: PointProperty=Field[{Format}] [,PointProperty=Field[{Format}]].

param.span: 例如：“Tooltip=Price{C1},Url=WebSiteName”。

span.span: For example: "Tooltip=Price{C1},Url=WebSiteName".

summary.span: 将数据点的 X 值、Y 值和属性值（如 Tooltip 或 LabelStyle）绑定到数据源的数据。

span.span: Data binds the X-value, Y-value(s) and property values of the data points, such as Tooltip or LabelStyle, to the data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据源可以是 Ole (SQL) DataReader、 数据视图、 数据集、 DataTable 或 DataRow。The data source can be the Ole(SQL)DataReader, DataView, DataSet, DataTable or DataRow.

summary.span: 将集合数据点的 X 值和 Y 值绑定到指定数据源第一列的数据。

span.span: Data binds the X-value and Y-values of the collection's data points to the first columns of the specified data source.

MemberSignature.Value: public void DataBindXY (System.Collections.IEnumerable xValue, params System.Collections.IEnumerable[] yValues);
.method public hidebysig instance void DataBindXY(class System.Collections.IEnumerable xValue, class System.Collections.IEnumerable[] yValues) cil managed
Public Sub DataBindXY (xValue As IEnumerable, ParamArray yValues As IEnumerable())
public: void DataBindXY(System::Collections::IEnumerable ^ xValue, ... cli::array <System::Collections::IEnumerable ^> ^ yValues);

param.name: xValue
param.span: 将为数据点提供 X 值的数据源。

span.span: The data source that will supply the X-values for the data points.

param.name: yValues
param.span: 添加到集合的 对象的 Y 值的逗号分隔列表。

span.span: A comma-separated list of the Y-value(s) of the object added to the collection.

summary.span: 将集合数据点的 X 值和 Y 值绑定到指定数据源第一列的数据。

span.span: Data binds the X-value and Y-values of the collection's data points to the first columns of the specified data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将所有绑定中的对象，并使用单独的 X 和 Y 的数据源的值。This method binds all objects in a , and uses separate data sources for the X and Y-value(s). 请注意，将使用数据源中的第一个可用列如果数据绑定到表。Note that the first available column in the data source will be used if data-binding to a table. 若要将绑定到以外的第一列的列，使用方法。To bind to a column other than the first column, use the method. 你可以通过将绑定到多个 Y 值提供的以逗号分隔的列表对象`yValues`参数。You can bind to multiple Y-values by providing a comma-separated list of objects for the `yValues` parameter. 如果 Y 值没有提供的数据源，或者提供的值的个数有误，则将引发异常。If Y-values are not provided by the data source, or if the wrong number of values are provided, an exception will be thrown. 如果你不想要显示散点图类型绘图，在其中使用 X 和 Y 值，则使用之一`DataBindY`方法相反。If you do not want to display scatter-type plots, in which both X and Y-values are used, use one of the `DataBindY` methods instead. 下面是可以作为数据源参数使用的对象的列表：The following is a list of objects that you can use as the data source parameter: - DataViewDataView - 数据读取器 （SQL、 OleDB）Data readers (SQL, OleDB) - 数组Arrays - 列表Lists - 所有其他对象使用接口。All other objects that use the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public void DataBindXY (System.Collections.IEnumerable xValue, string xField, System.Collections.IEnumerable yValue, string yFields);
.method public hidebysig instance void DataBindXY(class System.Collections.IEnumerable xValue, string xField, class System.Collections.IEnumerable yValue, string yFields) cil managed
Public Sub DataBindXY (xValue As IEnumerable, xField As String, yValue As IEnumerable, yFields As String)
public: void DataBindXY(System::Collections::IEnumerable ^ xValue, System::String ^ xField, System::Collections::IEnumerable ^ yValue, System::String ^ yFields);

param.name: xValue
param.span: 将为数据点提供 X 值的数据源。

span.span: The data source that will supply the X-values for the data points.

param.name: xField
param.span: 将为数据点提供 X 值的列的名称。

span.span: The name of the column that will supply the X-values for the data points.

param.name: yValue
param.span: 添加到集合的 对象的 Y 值的逗号分隔列表。

span.span: A comma-separated list of the Y-value(s) of the object added to the collection.

param.name: yFields
param.span: 一个逗号分隔列表，其中列出了将应用数据点的 Y 值的列名称。

span.span: A comma-separated list of column name(s) that will supply the Y-values for the data points.

param.span: 请注意，若要在列名称中嵌入逗号，可以使用双逗号。

span.span: Note that a comma can be embedded as part of a column name, by using a double comma.

summary.span: 将集合中数据点的 X 值和 Y 值绑定到指定数据源的指定列的数据。

span.span: Data binds the X-value and Y-values of the data points in the collection to the specified columns of the specified data sources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数据绑定到指定的数据源的第一列集合中的 X 值和数据点的 Y 值。Data binds the X-value and Y-values of the data points in the collection to the specified data source's first columns. 你可以通过将绑定到多个 Y 值设置`yFields`到多个列名称的参数。You can bind to several Y-values by setting the `yFields` parameter to multiple column names. 用逗号分隔的列名称。Separate the column names with commas. 如果 Y 值没有提供的数据源，或者提供的值的个数有误，则将引发异常。If Y-values are not provided by the data source, or if the wrong number of values are provided, an exception will be thrown. 如果你不想要显示散点图类型绘图，在其中使用 X 和 Y 值，则使用之一`DataBindY`方法相反。If you do not want to display scatter-type plots, in which both X and Y-values are used, use one of the `DataBindY` methods instead. 下面是可以作为数据源参数使用的对象的列表：The following is a list of objects that you can use as the data source parameter: - DataViewDataView - 数据读取器 （SQL、 OleDB）Data readers (SQL, OleDB) - 数组Arrays - 列表Lists - 所有其他对象使用接口。All other objects that use the interface.

summary.span: 将集合数据点的 Y 值绑定到指定数据源第一列的数据。

span.span: Data binds the Y-value(s) of the collection's data points to the first column of the specified data source(s).

MemberSignature.Value: public void DataBindY (params System.Collections.IEnumerable[] yValue);
.method public hidebysig instance void DataBindY(class System.Collections.IEnumerable[] yValue) cil managed
Public Sub DataBindY (ParamArray yValue As IEnumerable())
public: void DataBindY(... cli::array <System::Collections::IEnumerable ^> ^ yValue);

param.name: yValue
param.span: 一个或多个逗号分隔列表，其中列出了 数据源。

span.span: One or more comma-separated data sources.

summary.span: 将集合数据点的 Y 值绑定到指定数据源第一列的数据。

span.span: Data binds the Y-value(s) of the collection's data points to the first column of the specified data source(s).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将绑定 Y 的值的第一列到集合中的指定的数据源的数据点。This method binds the Y-value(s) of the data points in the collection to the first column of the specified data source(s). 若要将 Y 值绑定到不是第一个可用列的数据源列中，使用方法。To bind Y-values to a data source column that is not the first available column, use the method. 你可以通过将绑定多个 Y 值指定多个数据源，使用`yValue`参数。You can bind several Y-values by specifying multiple data sources, using the `yValue` parameter. 请注意每个数据源中的第一个可用列将用于每个数据点的连续的 Y 值。Note that the first available column in each data source will be used for each data point's successive Y-values. 例如，第一列的第一个数据源将绑定到数据点，第二个的第一列的第一个 Y 值数据源将绑定到数据点，第二个 Y 值等。For example, the first column of the first data source will be bound to the first Y-value of data points, the first column of the second data source will be bound to the second Y-value of data points, and so forth. 如果 Y 值没有提供的数据源，或者提供的值的个数有误，则将引发异常。If Y-values are not provided by the data source, or if the wrong number of values are provided, an exception will be thrown. 下面是可以作为数据源参数使用的对象的列表：The following is a list of objects that you can use as the data source parameter: 下面是可用作数据源的对象的列表：The following is a list of objects that you can use as the data source: - DataViewDataView - 数据读取器 （SQL、 OleDB）Data readers (SQL, OleDB) - 数组Arrays - 列表Lists - 所有其他对象使用接口。All other objects that use the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public void DataBindY (System.Collections.IEnumerable yValue, string yFields);
.method public hidebysig instance void DataBindY(class System.Collections.IEnumerable yValue, string yFields) cil managed
Public Sub DataBindY (yValue As IEnumerable, yFields As String)
public: void DataBindY(System::Collections::IEnumerable ^ yValue, System::String ^ yFields);

param.name: yValue
param.span: 一个 数据源对象，该对象提供 Y 值。

span.span: An data source object that provides the Y-value(s).

param.name: yFields
param.span: 向其绑定数据点的数据源字段。

span.span: The data source field(s) to which to bind data point(s).

param.span: 请注意，若要在列名称中嵌入逗号，可以使用双逗号。

span.span: Note that a comma can be embedded as part of a column name, by using a double comma.

summary.span: 将数据点的 Y 值绑定到指定数据源的指定列的数据。

span.span: Data binds the Y-value(s) of the data points to the specified column(s) of the specified data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将数据点的 Y 值绑定到数据源的指定字段 (s) 的集合中。This method binds the Y-values of the data points in the collection to the specified fields(s) of the data source. 若要将绑定到数据源中的第一个字段，请使用方法。To bind only to the first field in a data source, use the method. 可以通过设置绑定到多个域`yFields`参数是以逗号分隔的多个字段名称。You can bind to several fields by setting the `yFields` parameter to multiple field names that are comma-separated. 请注意，第一个字段将用于数据点的第一个 Y 值，第二个命名的字段将用于数据点的第二个 Y 值，等等。Note that the first field will be used for the data point's first Y-value, the second named field will be used for the data point's second Y-value, and so forth. 如果 Y 值没有提供的数据源，或提供的值的个数有误，则将引发异常。If Y-values are not provided by the data source, or the wrong number of values are provided, an exception will be thrown. 下面是可用作数据源的对象的列表：The following is a list of objects that you can use as the data source: - DataViewDataView - 数据读取器 （SQL、 OleDB）Data readers (SQL, OleDB) - 数组Arrays - 列表Lists - 所有其他对象使用接口。All other objects that use the interface.

summary.span: 查找等于指定值的所有数据点。

span.span: Find all the data points that are equal to the specified value.
